record.title: RECESS SUBJECT TO THE CALL OF THE CHAIR
record.narrative:
RECESS SUBJECT TO THE CALL OF THE CHAIR -- (Senate - September 27, 2007)

[Page: S12247]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in recess subject to the call of the Chair for 2 minutes so that we may bring in a distinguished visitor.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:12 p.m., recessed subject to the call of the Chair, until 6:14 p.m. and reassembled when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Mr. WHITEHOUSE).
